text:
6ix put out some of his best production, and a lot of the time, Logic's just...talking! Not even rhyming, just... talking
In some instances for more than half of the song!
I actually checked, and, disregarding the chorus, Logic raps 440 words' worth of unique bars on the last song on the album. If you look at how long it actually is, disregarding the skits and chorus, is 1167 words, nearly three times as long
https://www.reddit.com/r/hiphopheads/comments/69vql1/logics_latest_album_everybody_had_20_minutes_and/ Also a good regarding the album.
